tool.name: SAGA.shapes_points.11
tool.command: $__tool_directory__/Code/openapi.py isArrayPOINTS False isArrayFIELD False output_data_FILTER $output_data_FILTER name SAGA.shapes_points.11 POINTS $POINTS FIELD $FIELD RADIUS $RADIUS MINNUM $MINNUM MAXNUM $MAXNUM QUADRANTS $QUADRANTS METHOD $METHOD TOLERANCE $TOLERANCE PERCENT $PERCENT prefer $prefer response $response outputType_FILTER $OutputSection_FILTER.outputType_FILTER transmissionMode_FILTER $OutputSection_FILTER.transmissionMode_FILTER

param.name: POINTS
param.label: Points
param.help: Points The following data types are allowed in the txt file: vnd.google-earth.kml+xml, xml, json

param.name: FIELD
param.label: Attribute
param.help: Attribute The following data types are allowed in the txt file: csv

param.name: MINNUM
param.label: Minimum Number of Points
param.help: only points with given minimum number of points in search radius will be processed

param.name: MAXNUM
param.label: Maximum Number of Points
param.help: Number of nearest points, which will be evaluated for filtering. Set to zero to investigate all points in search radius.

param.name: response
param.label: Response Type
param.help: Choose 'raw' for raw data or 'document' for document data.

section.name: OutputSection_FILTER
section.title: Select the appropriate transmission mode for the output format

param.name: outputType_FILTER
param.label: Author did not provide help for this parameter...
